description:
Feel at home in the great outdoors. The Kansbol's dual grind angles give you a thinner edge for finely detailed cuts, and a thicker, scandi-ground edge for more demanding work. A symmetrical hard sheath cradles the knife safely and securely whether the edge is facing forward or back. The dual-textured grip gives you solid purchase while you whittle or carve. Renowned for their reliability, these iconic knives have been crafted in Mora, Sweden, since 1891.

  • Dual-textured handle provides a comfortable and secure grip
  • Scandi-ground blade is great for a variety of outdoor tasks
  • Compound-grind blade is thinner at the tip and thicker towards the base, adding versatility
  • Flat-ground spine acts as a perfect scraper for a fire steel
  • Rugged polypropylene sheath protects the edge and has a drain/lanyard hole and positive retention
  • Symmetrical sheath and handle design work equally well in right- or left-handed setups
  • Lanyard hole lets you add a lanyard for an extra measure of safety and retention
name: Mora Kansbol Knife with Sheath
